messages.content: A plane has just crashed into the Hudson River.
U.S. Air, Big D.C. 9 or 10 has crashed into the Hudson River.
Oh, my God, it was a big plane. I heard a big boom just now.
We looked up and the plane came straight over us and it was turning. Oh, my God.
Sure as I called you, the plane disappeared out of sight. I guess because of the buildings.
Was it a large or small plane?
It looked like an Airbus plane, like a big plane.
All right, sir. Stay right there, I'm sending everybody, okay?
Yeah, I'm witnessing an airplane going down. It's on fire on the left side.
It's turning. I don't know where it's going to fall, though.
Oh, my God. Where are you?
